result.arabic_text: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
result.translation: Vyongeye, sinzi rero kumbure ko itenyenya ku bihano mwihutira gusaba ko vyoshika, harimwo igeragezwa kuri mwebwe kugira muryoherwe gato mu buzima bwo kw’isi, maze mubandanye mugarariza, gutyo muzohabwe ibihano ruhasha".
